name: Chrono Trigger Devolution
overview: Get ready to have an all-time classic turned on it’s head! CT Devolution is a comical retelling of the Chrono Trigger story. All the dialog has been gutted and re-worked, transforming the game into a hilarious parody of epic proportions! It is a totally irreverent tribute to the original game that completely changes the personalities of all the characters. Now, instead of just trying to save the future, Crono and his team are out to take over the world… So kick-start your sense of humor, sit back, and enjoy a new spin on this crazy time-traveling adventure!
